name: Dice Master (Mikosusek)
description:
Hi, we are very happy with the topic that was chosen this year. 

This is our first gamejam and we had a lot of fun taking part in it. We like the concept that we managed to create very much and we still have many ideas for it but time was chasing us. 

We present to you a game that will very likely be further developed by us after the end of the gamejam. The game is puzzle themed and it is about positioning yourself, on the map to destroy enemmy dices and aquire their dots.
